dct_title_s: Wide-screen project : historical geography of the Bible lands : map student ’B’, Ezra-Nehemiah through Justinian [sheet 2]
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by gradient tints and shading. "Consultant: J. Monson." "Base map ... prepared and printed by the Survey of Israel, May 1976." "Archaeology and history supplementary maps 1-12." Maps are designed to be used with the author's Student map manual, historical geography of the Bible lands. Includes index.
